Undergraduate Research

I spent a year and a half doing computer graphics research as an undergrad. Below are two projects I completed that had to do with procedurally generating fractal trees using C++ and OpenGL.

  • Conforming Realistic, Procedural Tree Models to User-Drawn Shapes (2019, for departmental honors)
    Poster GitHub
  • Generating Plant Models using Fractals (2018, directed independent study)
    Poster GitHub
